story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_0100:
They just keep coming and coming! This is starting
to get annoying!
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_0200: Tch. If only Red were here...
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_0400: Red! I’m so glad you’re safe!
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_0500: Where were you all this time?
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_0700:
Wait, you took out half of Team Rocket, then went
into hiding so you and your Pokémon
could recover?
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_0800: H-half of them? All by yourself?
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_1000: You idiot! Why didn’t you take me with you?!
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_1100:
If you took down half of ’em, I could’ve done the
other half, and we’d be done in one go!
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_1200: Hmph. Whatever. I’m just glad you’re safe.
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_1300:
And it’s not too late to let loose on the rest of
these amateurs!
story_teamrocket_01_12000/2401_1201_1400: All right. Let’s settle this. Giovanni’s up ahead!
